# f5distributedcloud_site_mesh_group (Data Source)

The `f5distributedcloud_site_mesh_group` data source retrieves information about an existing site mesh group.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "f5distributedcloud_site_mesh_group" "example" {
  name      = "my-site-mesh-group"
  namespace = "system"
}

output "mesh_type" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_site_mesh_group.example.mesh_type
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the site mesh group to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the site mesh group is located.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the site mesh group.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the site mesh group.
- `mesh_type` (String) Type of the site mesh group.
